attributes.action: Not enforce the new interview procedure for new Passport applicants and leave it as it currently is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the release of the proposed idea of interviewing new passport applicants and scanning fingerprints for new applicants from the 1st April 2007, it is making us law abiding citizens feel like the criminals? Also some of the applicants work in an industry where it is not the usual 9-5 so could considerably delay the recieving of a passport where you would need to wait for a convinient time to be interviewed.
